channel.title: Two-Pointers on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Two-Pointers on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 82 Remove Duplicates From Sorted List II
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 82 Question Given the head of a sorted linked list, delete all nodes that have duplicate numbers, leaving only distinct numbers from the original list.

item.title: Problem 881 Boats to Save People
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 881 Question You are given an array people where people[i] is the weight of the ith person, and an infinite number of boats where each boat can carry a maximum weight of limit.
